INNER JOIN zgk_user_collection_3in7 collection on collection.universityId = zz.universityId and collection.majorCode = zz.majorCode and zz.batch=collection.batch AND collection.userId = #{userId}
from zgk2.zgk_zj_3in7 zz INNER join zgk2.zgk_university uu on uu.id=zz.universityId
mapper.select: select count(DISTINCT zz.universityName) as schoolNumber,count(*) as majorNumber from zgk2.zgk_zj_3in7 zz where zz.selectSubject like CONCAT('%', #{subject1} , '%') or zz.selectSubject like CONCAT('%', #{subject2} , '%') or zz.selectSubject like CONCAT('%', #{subject3} , '%') or zz.selectCount=0

select zz.batch as batch,count(DISTINCT zz.id) as majorNumber, count(zz.id)/( select count(*) as majorNumber from zgk2.zgk_zj_3in7 zz where zz.selectSubject like CONCAT('%', #{subject1} , '%') or zz.selectSubject like CONCAT('%', #{subject2} , '%') or zz.selectSubject like CONCAT('%', #{subject3} , '%') or zz.selectCount=0 ) as percent from zgk2.zgk_zj_3in7 zz where zz.selectSubject like CONCAT('%', #{subject1} , '%') or zz.selectSubject like CONCAT('%', #{subject2} , '%') or zz.selectSubject like CONCAT('%', #{subject3} , '%') or zz.selectCount=0 group by zz.batch
